price: Shin, ba ka ganĩ ba, yadda Allah Ya buga wani mĩsali, kalma mai kyau* kamar itãciya ce mai kyau, asalinta yanã tabbatacce, kuma rẽshenta yanã cikin sama?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا كَلِمَةٗ طَيِّبَةٗ كَشَجَرَةٖ طَيِّبَةٍ أَصۡلُهَا ثَابِتٞ وَفَرۡعُهَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ
footnotes: * Kalma mai kyau ta addini tanã da asali, kamar itãciyar Dabĩno ce.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan kalimatan ṭayyibatan kashajaratin ṭayyibatin aṣluhā thābitun wafarʿuhā fī al-samāi
